name: WWII Photo Journey
description: The images of World War II are among the most breathtaking in human history. Frozen in time is the suffering of humanity as well as the highs of victory. WWII Photo Journey explores 1939-1945 like no other app for iPhone has. Simply swipe the screen from left to right and the image will change. Click the save button and the photo will be placed in your phone photo library, where one can share with friends or family. Also, the photos are cropped perfectly to be used for your phone wallpaper.
